1.title: Phishing Awareness
1.subtitle: Spot suspicious emails, protect your team
1.sectionTitle: In This Training, You Will Learn:
1.callToActionText: Swipe to begin your awareness journey

texts.cardDescription: Skills to gain from this training

goals.title: Detect Phishing
goals.subtitle: Identification
goals.description: Learn to quickly identify phishing attempts

goals.title: Report Correctly
goals.subtitle: Action
goals.description: Understand when and how to report phishing emails

goals.title: Promote Security Culture
goals.subtitle: Team Behavior
goals.description: Build a habit of secure communication

video.transcript:
00:00:04.400 security is always a top priority but an
00:00:07.919 experience I had last month made me
00:00:10.400 change my behavior one day during my
00:00:13.120 lunch break I received an email that
00:00:15.639 looked like it was from the finance
00:00:17.439 department it asked me to approve an
00:00:20.039 invoice something felt off the invoice
00:00:23.320 number was strange and there were a few
00:00:25.519 grammar mistakes thanks to my cyber
00:00:28.279 security training I quickly realized it
00:00:30.679 was a phishing attempt I thought someone
00:00:33.879 might fall for this but instead of
00:00:36.239 reporting it I moved on with my work
00:00:38.760 assuming it will catch it anyway a week
00:00:42.079 later our company announced a phishing
00:00:44.840 attack has led to a data breach exposing
00:00:47.680 customer information the email I had ignored was
00:00:51.559 part of that attack if I had reported it
00:00:54.719 the whole crisis might have been avoided
00:00:57.600 after the breach the company held a
00:00:59.600 meeting the IT team explained how the attack
00:01:03.199 happened and the damage it caused not
00:01:05.880 just reputational harm but also
00:01:08.320 financial loss I was shocked and felt
00:01:11.280 guilty a simple secure reporting
00:01:14.119 behavior could have made all the
00:01:16.439 difference here's what I learned from
00:01:18.439 this experience don't assume someone
00:01:21.320 else will report it just do it if
00:01:24.119 everyone thinks the same way nothing
00:01:26.439 gets done we all share the
00:01:28.560 responsibility know your company's
00:01:30.960 reporting process if you're unsure ask it there are always tools to make
00:01:37.439 reporting easier never underestimate
00:01:40.399 phishing attacks even one fake email can
00:01:43.439 put the entire company at risk after
00:01:46.560 this incident I realized that combating
00:01:49.079 cyber attacks is only possible when
00:01:51.439 everyone practices secure
00:01:53.640 behaviors identifying a phishing email
00:01:56.520 isn't enough you have to take action
00:02:00.000 but

ariaTexts.mainDescription: Animated reenactment of a real phishing case

actions.title: Identify Suspicious Email
actions.description: Review the email header, sender, and formatting for phishing signs.
actions.tip: Look for mismatched URLs or urgent requests.

actions.title: Avoid Clicking Links
actions.description: Do not click on any links in a suspicious email.
actions.tip: Hover to preview the destination before clicking.

actions.title: Use the Report Button
actions.description: Use the phishing report button in your email client.
actions.tip: In Outlook or Gmail, look for the 'Report Phishing' icon.

ariaTexts.mainDescription: Actionable phishing response steps for email users
ariaTexts.actionCardsDescription: Action steps to respond to phishing

list.title: Phishing Red Flags
list.statement: Phishing emails often create a sense of urgency to make you act quickly.
list.explanation: Phishing attackers often use urgent or threatening language to create panic.

texts.completionSubtitle: You've strengthened your ability to detect and report phishing emails.
texts.motivationalMessage: Cyber threats evolve, but so can your behavior. Keep applying what you've learned, and encourage your team to do the same.

immediateActions.title: Do Now
immediateActions.description: Check your email inbox and report any suspicious messages using the reporting button.

immediateActions.title: This Week
immediateActions.description: Share what you've learned in this training with at least one teammate.

immediateActions.title: This Month
immediateActions.description: Organize a short awareness session or microlearning follow-up in your team.
